articles.title: Singapore announces bid to host World Athletics Championships in 2025 - CNA

articles.title: Pure Red Cell Aplasia: Overview and More - Verywell Health
articles.description: In pure red cell aplasia, the bone marrow doesn't make as many health red blood cells as it normally should. This leads to a kind of anemia.
articles.content: Pure red cell aplasia (PRCA) is a medical condition in which some of your red blood cells, the cells responsible for carrying oxygen around your body, dont form normally. This can lead to one kind of… [+9159 chars]

articles.title: AirAsia X completes debt restructure, to write back RM33bil to profit - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: Airasia X Bhd (AAX) said on Wednesday it had completed its debt restructuring, and will write RM33bil back to profits in the next quarter.
